title Newton's Crates
author Andrey Shevchuk
homepage shevchuk.net

background_color darkbrown
text_color lightgrey
noaction

again_interval 0.1

00000

=======
LEGEND
=======

. = Background
# = Wall
P = Player
* = Crate
z = zCrate
0 = Crate and Target
@ = zCrate and Target
o = Target
a = Apple
c = AppleCore
1 = m1 and Apple and Crate
2 = m2 and Apple
3 = m3 and Apple and Crate
4 = m4 and Apple and Crate
5 = m5 and Apple and Crate
6 = m6 and Apple and Crate
y = cloud
, = spaace
g = lastTarget
h = lastTarget and Crate

Inertial = Crate or zCrate or Wall or lastCrateOnTarget

Mumbling = m1 or m2 or m3 or m4 or m5 or m6

Clearsky = clearsky1 or clearsky2 or clearsky3
Fapple = fapple0 or fapple1 or fapple2 or fapple3
Fapples = Fapple or fappleg
Finalists = Finalist0 or Finalist1 or Finalist2
Players = Player or Finalists or Genius
Squashing = fapple or Wall or fappleg or lastCrateOnTarget

WaitFrames = wait0 or wait1 or wait2 or wait3 or wait4 or wait5

WinAnimationStartFrame = Winner001 or Winner101 or Winner201 or Winner301 or Winner401 or Winner501

WinnerFrames = Winner001 or Winner002 or Winner003 or Winner004 or Winner005 or Winner006 or Winner007 or Winner008 or Winner101 or Winner102 or Winner103 or Winner104 or Winner105 or Winner106 or Winner107 or Winner108 or Winner109 or Winner201 or Winner202 or Winner203 or Winner204 or Winner205 or Winner206 or Winner207 or Winner208 or Winner209 or Winner210 or Winner211 or Winner301 or Winner302 or Winner303 or Winner304 or Winner305 or Winner306 or Winner307 or Winner308 or Winner309 or Winner401 or Winner402 or Winner403 or Winner404 or Winner405 or Winner406 or Winner407 or Winner408 or Winner409 or Winner501 or Winner502 or Winner503 or Winner504 or Winner505 or Winner506 or Winner507 or Winner508 or Winner509

=======
SOUNDS
=======

Inertial MOVE 62522307 (66976107) (36772507) (36718107)
(Player Move 61661707) (too repetitive on long runs)
sfx0 60497100 (zCrate moves on target)
(sfx1 (58358104) (16763304) (bumping into a wall))

sfx1 17123907 (green)
sfx2 74112904
sfx3 60342907
sfx5 47189907
sfx6 68393107
sfx4 21039704 (wall)
sfx10 70198308
sfx7 65707900 (Level Complete)
Undo 54083907
Restart 5315306
sfx9 94701308 (30980508) (16825502) (apple!)
sfx8 67172908 (eurika)

================
COLLISIONLAYERS
================

Background
squashUL 
squashUR
squashDL
squashDR
squashgU
squashgD
squashgL
squashgR
squashU
squashL
squashD
squashR, WaitFrames, Mumbling
Target, Apple, AppleCore, cloud, Clearsky, spaace, lastTarget
Players, Inertial, yeaCrate, WinnerFrames, fapples

======
RULES
======

(The actual rules of the game)

[ > Player | Inertial ] -> [ > Player | > Inertial ]
[ > Inertial | Inertial ] -> [ Inertial | > Inertial ]
[ > Wall ] -> [ Wall ]
[ > zCrate | Target ] -> [ > zCrate | Target ] sfx0


(Win conditions, convoluted for the purposes of animation)

late [ zCrate Target ] -> [ yeaCrate Target ]
late [ yeaCrate ][ zCrate ] -> [ zCrate ][ zCrate ]
late [ yeaCrate ][Player] -> [yeaCrate][ wait0 random WinAnimationStartFrame ] sfx7


(Win animations)

late [wait4] -> [wait5] again
late [wait3] -> [wait4] again
late [wait2] -> [wait3] again
late [wait1] -> [wait2] again
late [wait0] -> [wait1] again

late [ Winner509 ] -> Win
late [ Winner508 ][wait3] -> [ Winner509 ][wait0] again
late [ Winner507 ][wait3] -> [ Winner508 ][wait0] again
late [ Winner506 ][wait3] -> [ Winner507 ][wait0] again
late [ Winner505 ][wait3] -> [ Winner506 ][wait0] again
late [ Winner504 ][wait3] -> [ Winner505 ][wait0] again
late [ Winner503 ][wait3] -> [ Winner504 ][wait0] again
late [ Winner502 ][wait3] -> [ Winner503 ][wait0] again
late [ Winner501 ][wait3] -> [ Winner502 ][wait0] again

late [ Winner409 ] -> Win
late [ Winner408 ][wait3] -> [ Winner409 ][wait0] again
late [ Winner407 ][wait3] -> [ Winner408 ][wait0] again
late [ Winner406 ][wait3] -> [ Winner407 ][wait0] again
late [ Winner405 ][wait3] -> [ Winner406 ][wait0] again
late [ Winner404 ][wait3] -> [ Winner405 ][wait0] again
late [ Winner403 ][wait3] -> [ Winner404 ][wait0] again
late [ Winner402 ][wait3] -> [ Winner403 ][wait0] again
late [ Winner401 ][wait3] -> [ Winner402 ][wait0] again

late [ Winner309 ] -> Win
late [ Winner308 ][wait3] -> [ Winner309 ][wait0] again
late [ Winner307 ][wait3] -> [ Winner308 ][wait0] again
late [ Winner306 ][wait3] -> [ Winner307 ][wait0] again
late [ Winner305 ][wait3] -> [ Winner306 ][wait0] again
late [ Winner304 ][wait3] -> [ Winner305 ][wait0] again
late [ Winner303 ][wait3] -> [ Winner304 ][wait0] again
late [ Winner302 ][wait3] -> [ Winner303 ][wait0] again
late [ Winner301 ][wait3] -> [ Winner302 ][wait0] again

late [ Winner211 ] -> Win
late [ Winner210 ][wait3] -> [ Winner211 ][wait0] again
late [ Winner209 ][wait3] -> [ Winner210 ][wait0] again
late [ Winner208 ][wait3] -> [ Winner209 ][wait0] again
late [ Winner207 ][wait3] -> [ Winner208 ][wait0] again
late [ Winner206 ][wait3] -> [ Winner207 ][wait0] again
late [ Winner205 ][wait3] -> [ Winner206 ][wait0] again
late [ Winner204 ][wait3] -> [ Winner205 ][wait0] again
late [ Winner203 ][wait3] -> [ Winner204 ][wait0] again
late [ Winner202 ][wait3] -> [ Winner203 ][wait0] again
late [ Winner201 ][wait3] -> [ Winner202 ][wait0] again

late [ Winner109 ] -> Win
late [ Winner108 ][wait3] -> [ Winner109 ][wait0] again
late [ Winner107 ][wait3] -> [ Winner108 ][wait0] again
late [ Winner106 ][wait3] -> [ Winner107 ][wait0] again
late [ Winner105 ][wait3] -> [ Winner106 ][wait0] again
late [ Winner104 ][wait3] -> [ Winner105 ][wait0] again
late [ Winner103 ][wait3] -> [ Winner104 ][wait0] again
late [ Winner102 ][wait3] -> [ Winner103 ][wait0] again
late [ Winner101 ][wait3] -> [ Winner102 ][wait0] again

late [ Winner008 ] -> Win
late [ Winner007 ][wait3] -> [ Winner008 ][wait0] again
late [ Winner006 ][wait3] -> [ Winner007 ][wait0] again
late [ Winner005 ][wait3] -> [ Winner006 ][wait0] again
late [ Winner004 ][wait3] -> [ Winner005 ][wait0] again
late [ Winner003 ][wait3] -> [ Winner004 ][wait0] again
late [ Winner002 ][wait3] -> [ Winner003 ][wait0] again
late [ Winner001 ][wait3] -> [ Winner002 ][wait0] again


(Apples and Mumblings)

late [ Player Apple ] -> [ Player AppleCore] sfx9

late [ Player m1 ] -> [ Player ] message Doesn't make much sense to put easter eggs into an open source game, does it? :)
late [ Player m2 ] -> [ Player ] message Ooooo! An apple!
late [ Player m3 ] -> [ Player ] message Who even builds warehouses like this!?
late [ Player m4 ] -> [ Player ] message Boy, has science funding in this country seen better days...
late [ Player m5 ] -> [ Player ] message You've gained +3 health!
late [ Player m6 ] -> [ Player ] message Wait... how was I supposed to find this one!?



(The cutscene ;)

late [ Crate lastTarget ] -> [ yeaCrate lastTarget ]
late [lastTarget][ Crate ][ yeaCrate ] -> [lastTarget][ Crate ][ Crate ]
late down [yeaCrate][cloud | ... | Player] -> [lastCrateOnTarget][cloud fapple0 | ... | Player] sfx10 (the aimed apple spawn)

down [ fapple | Player ] -> [ fapple | Finalist0 wait0 ] sfx8 again

(The intriguing pause)
[Finalist2 wait5] -> [Genius] again
[Finalist1 wait5] -> [Finalist2 wait0] again
[Finalist0 wait5] -> [Finalist1 wait0] again

random [cloud no fapple][Genius] -> [cloud random fapple][Genius]
down [ cloud fapple | ... | spaace no fapples | fapples] -> [ cloud fappleg | ... | spaace | fapples]
down [ fapples | no wall no players no fapples no lastCrateOnTarget] -> [> fapples |] again
down [fapples | ... | moving fapples] -> [ | ... | moving fapples]

(These are only for sfx)
[> fapples | | wall]   -> [ | fapples | wall] sfx4
[> fapples | | lastCrateOnTarget]   -> [ | fapples | lastCrateOnTarget] sfx4
[> fappleg | | fapples] -> [ | fappleg | fapples] sfx1
[> fapple0 | | fapples] -> [ | fapple0 | fapples] sfx2
[> fapple1 | | fapples] -> [ | fapple1 | fapples] sfx3
[> fapple2 | | fapples] -> [ | fapple2 | fapples] sfx5
[> fapple3 | | fapples] -> [ | fapple3 | fapples] sfx6

(Randomize clouds for the next iteration)
[Clearsky] -> [cloud]
[moving fapple][cloud] -> [moving fapple][random Clearsky]
[clearsky1] -> [cloud]
[cloud] -> [cloud] again

(Squashing)
left  [stationary fapples | stationary squashing] -> [fapples squashL | squashing]
right [stationary fapples | stationary squashing] -> [fapples squashR | squashing]
down  [stationary fapples | stationary squashing] -> [fapples squashD | squashing]
up    [stationary fapples | stationary squashing] -> [fapples squashU | squashing]
[squashU squashL] -> [squashU squashL squashUL]
[squashU squashR] -> [squashU squashR squashUR]
[squashD squashL] -> [squashD squashL squashDL]
[squashD squashR] -> [squashD squashR squashDR]
[squashD squashU squashL squashR] -> []

right [stationary fappleg | stationary fappleg] -> [fappleg squashgR | squashgL fappleg]
down [stationary fappleg | stationary fappleg] -> [fappleg squashgD | squashgU fappleg]

==============
WINCONDITIONS
==============

(All zCrate on Target)

=======
LEVELS
=======

###.......p.......###
###.#z##.###.#.##.###

###.#*##.###*#*##.###
###..*..*...*.*oo.###

#####*##*###*#.######

###.######.######.###
###..####...####..###

message No more than one more...

##########.....########.o###########
###........###...........###########
###.######.#.z..####z#z#z###########
###.######.#...#####...#o###########
###.######.o.####.##.###.###########
###.#######..#######.#...#####..####
#.o.**#####.########.###o.####..z...
#.###.#####.########......####.##o..
....z.#####....#####....######*###.#
..###.########.##############..o##.#

##############.###############.##..#

message That's it!
message I'm done!
message I quit!
message I'm going back to my calculus!
